<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.48

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the values of rendering distances of objects and shadows.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getObjectViewDistance'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in format [objectDistance, shadowDistance]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_arr = [[getObjectViewDistance]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setObjectViewDistance]], [[setViewDistance]], [[viewDistance]], [[setDetailMapBlendPars]], [[setTerrainGrid]]
</value></part></template>
